comments:
1. Select Help:Cheat Sheet... menu.
2. Select "Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools".
3. Select "Chart & Listing Report" and click OK.  The Cheat Sheets view comes up and shows the "Creation of Chart and Listing Report" topic.
4. Under Introduction, select "Click to Begin".
5. Under "Create a DataSource", select "Click to Perform".
=> "Problem Occurred" box pops up, saying "Exception thrown while running action."

Here is the exception from the .log file.
